channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Boeing shares fall in wake of deadliest air crash in South Korean history
item.description: Jeju Air’s flight 2216 crash landed at South Korea’s Muan International Airport on Dec. 29 killing 179 of the Boeing plane’s 181 passengers

item.title: Jimmy Carter quotes: 'I could have wiped Iran off the map'
item.description: "I could have wiped Iran off the map," Jimmy Carter told CNBC in 2014. Memorable quotes from the 39th president.

item.title: The ‘BATMMAAN’ stocks swooped to the market’s rescue in December. Will they keep climbing in 2025?

item.description: European markets traded in negative territory on Monday, in what will be the region's final full trading session of the year.
